name: PetGardenVR (Oculus Quest 2)
description:
PetGardenVR is a small VR environment where you can interact with pets and play mini games.

Currently this project is only a prototype, but I will continue development depending on the downloads / comments.

The app is available as apk download for the Oculus Quest, you have to download and manually sideload it to your Quest.

I will try to release it on Oculus AppLab if there is enough interest.

This app was developed with the Oculus Quest 2. I don't have a Quest 1, so I don't know if the game runs on the Quest 1, please leave a comment if you were able to play it on a Quest 1.

Im a software developer, the code is written by me. But other assets like 3d models are bought from the Unity Asset store. The donation money will be used to buy and integrate additional assets.

Donation goals:

  • 0 / 30 $ Cats bundle
  • 0 / 40 $ Dogs bundle
  • 0 / 20 $ Dragon (four legs)
  • 0 / 20$ Dragon (two legs, wyvern)
  • 0 / 15 $ Penguin
  • 0 / 20$ Deer
  • 0 / 30 $ Meerkat
  • Additional polish and content (please add details or comment below)

Please add a comment to your donation to let me know which goals you want to support.
